entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
